properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 30 APR BY
   M/V BOA GALATEA TOWING 5.4 MILE LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   01-02N 046-57W, 01-52N 045-52W,
   01-26S 041-24W, 02-10S 041-24W,
   02-10S 042-08W, 02-05S 042-08W,
   02-05S 042-42W, 01-48S 042-56W,
   01-52S 043-04W, 01-30S 043-32W,
   00-37S 043-49W, 00-37S 044-00W,
   00-30S 044-08W, 00-14S 044-08W,
   00-14S 044-23W, 00-08S 044-23W,
   00-08S 045-32W, 00-41N 046-18W,
   00-50N 046-18W, 00-50N 046-50W,
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 01 MAY 13.
